data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sheng, Ying-Yi, Wu, Qiong, Achterberg, Cornelis Van, Chen, Xue-Xin (2019): Three newly recorded genera from China (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Opiinae) with the notes on the genus Neopius and descriptions of three new species. Zootaxa 4604 (3): 588-600, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4604.3.13|6 occurrences
